name: Baby Tennis On Line Ping Pong
name_original: Baby Tennis On Line Ping Pong
description:
Challenge real opponents on line in this table tennis simulation.
Win credits and thus acquire better paddles amongst the 12 available, improve your rank and make your country improves its status in the international competition!
Baby Tennis On Line Ping Pong Pro Version is a new way of playing table tennis: here, the paddle follows the ball, you concentre on where you want to send it, the force and the lift to apply.
The goal is to leave the device away from the ball.
In on line tournaments you and your challenger will play a device of same strength, the one that achieves the best result can carry on the tournament and get the rewards.
Full 3D, the game is driven by an highly realistic physics engine.
